overview.title: Symposium of Undergraduate Robotics, Engineering & IT
overview.excerpt: Join us for SUREI, a project showcase event where students present their robotics, engineering, and IT projects to share ideas and innovations.

details.title: Symposium of Undergraduate Robotics, Engineering & IT
details.longDescription: SUREI is a project showcase where undergraduate students present their work in robotics, engineering, and IT. This is a fantastic opportunity to explore innovative projects, collaborate with peers, and gain inspiration from the ideas and achievements of fellow students.
